text: I would recommend looking at these sites for info on screenwriting <https://nfts.co.uk/screenwriting|https://nfts.co.uk/screenwriting> and <https://www.screenskills.com/careers/how-to-network-well/|https://www.screenskills.com/careers/how-to-network-well/> when networking its about not being afraid to ask questions to expand your knowledge. Its hard at this point in your studies to network professionally but you could find social media groups, where people have a shared interest and look for virtual meetups & talks! I hope this helps as a starting point but let me know if you have any further queries. Thanks Claire

attachments.title: Screenwriting
attachments.text: Could you write an award-winning movie, TV drama or animation? Or devise a multi-layered narrative for a ground-breaking game? Graduates are currently writing TV episodes from Humans to Casualty, Penny Dreadful to Eastenders, and working with movie directors such as Sam Mendes, Lone Scherfig and Darren Aronofsky.Â
